member.name: T:System.Drawing.ColorOrder
member.summary: Enum for specifying the order in which color components are arranged in a pixel.

member.name: F:System.Drawing.ColorOrder.Rgb
member.summary: Red-Green-Blue (RGB) order.

member.name: F:System.Drawing.ColorOrder.Bgr
member.summary: Blue-Green-Red (BGR) order.

member.name: F:System.Drawing.ColorOrder.Brg
member.summary: Blue-Red-Green (BRG) order.

member.name: F:System.Drawing.ColorOrder.Gbr
member.summary: Green-Blue-Red (GBR) order.

member.name: F:System.Drawing.ColorOrder.Rbg
member.summary: Red-Blue-Green (RBG) order.

member.name: F:System.Drawing.ColorOrder.Grb
member.summary: Green-Red-Blue (GRB) order.

member.name: T:System.Drawing.Color
member.summary: Represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color.

member.summary: Gets the blue component value of this System.Drawing.Color structure.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a System.Drawing.Color structure from the specified 8-bit color values (red, green, and blue). The alpha value is implicitly 255 (fully opaque). Although this method allows a 32-bit value to be passed for each color component, the value of each component is limited to 8 bits.
member.param: The red component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The green component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The blue component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
member.returns: The System.Drawing.Color structure that this method creates.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a System.Drawing.Color structure from the specified 8-bit color values (red, green, and blue). The alpha value is implicitly 255 (fully opaque). Although this method allows a 32-bit value to be passed for each color component, the value of each component is limited to 8 bits.
member.param: The alpha component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The red component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The green component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The blue component value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
member.returns: The System.Drawing.Color structure that this method creates.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a System.Drawing.Color structure from a 32-bit ARGB value.
member.param: A value specifying the 32-bit ARGB value.
member.returns: The System.Drawing.Color structure that this method creates.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Creates a System.Drawing.Color structure from the specified System.Drawing.Color structure, but with the new specified alpha value. Although this method allows a 32-bit value to be passed for the alpha value, the value is limited to 8 bits.
member.param: The alpha value for the new System.Drawing.Color. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The System.Drawing.Color from which to create the new System.Drawing.Color.
member.returns: The System.Drawing.Color that this method creates.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.op_Equality(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Tests whether two specified System.Drawing.Color structures are equivalent.
member.param: The System.Drawing.Color that is to the left of the equality operator.
The System.Drawing.Color that is to the right of the equality operator.
member.returns: true if the two System.Drawing.Color structures are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.op_Inequality(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Tests whether two specified System.Drawing.Color structures are different.
member.param: The System.Drawing.Color that is to the left of the inequality operator.
The System.Drawing.Color that is to the right of the inequality operator.
member.returns: true if the two System.Drawing.Color structures are different; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.ParseHexChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Internal Helper function for ParseHex.
member.param: Value to convert.
member.returns: Int value.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.FromHex(System.String)
member.summary: Convert String into an Color struct.
member.param: Color String. Allowed formats are #AARRGGBB #RRGGBB #ARGB #RGB.
member.returns: Returns an Color struct otherwise throws an exception.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.GetFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Convert String with a known color name into an Color struct.
member.param: The name of the color.
member.returns: A color.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.TryGetColor(System.String,System.Drawing.Color@)
member.summary: Tries to convert a string into a color either from a color name either from a HEX representation.
member.param: The string to convert.
The color.
member.returns: A color.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this object.
member.returns: true if the current object is equal to other; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.GetBrightness
member.summary: Gets the hue-saturation-lightness (HSL) lightness value for this System.Drawing.Color structure.
member.returns: The lightness of this System.Drawing.Color. The lightness ranges from 0.0 through 1.0, where 0.0 represents black and 1.0 represents white.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this System.Drawing.Color structure.
member.returns: An integer value that specifies the hash code for this System.Drawing.Color.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.GetHue
member.summary: Gets the hue-saturation-lightness (HSL) hue value, in degrees, for this System.Drawing.Color structure.
member.returns: The hue, in degrees, of this System.Drawing.Color. The hue is measured in degrees, ranging from 0.0 through 360.0, in HSL color space.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.GetSaturation
member.summary: Gets the hue-saturation-lightness (HSL) saturation value for this System.Drawing.Color structure.
member.returns: The saturation of this System.Drawing.Color. The saturation ranges from 0.0 through 1.0, where 0.0 is grayscale and 1.0 is the most saturated.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.ToArgb
member.summary: Gets the 32-bit ARGB value of this System.Drawing.Color structure.
member.returns: The 32-bit ARGB value of this System.Drawing.Color.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.To1bpp
member.summary: Gets a value representing this color as On/Off.
member.returns: The 1-bit-per-pixel value of the specified

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.To4bppGrayscale
member.summary: Gets the 4-bits per pixel grayscale value of this color.
member.returns: The 4-bit-per-pixel grayscale value of the specified

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.To8bppGrayscale
member.summary: Gets the 8-bits per pixel grayscale value of this color.
member.returns: The 8-bit-per-pixel grayscale value of the specified

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.To8bppRgb332
member.summary: Gets the 8-bits per pixel value of this color. Colors are encoded in 3 bits for red, 3 bits for green and 2 bits for blue.
member.returns: The 8-bit-per-pixel RGB332 value of the specified

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.To12bppRgb444
member.summary: Gets the 12-bits per pixel value of this color. All color components are encoded with 4 bits.
member.returns: The 12-bit-per-pixel RGB444 value of the specified

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.ToBgr565
member.summary: Gets a BGR565 value of this color structure.
member.returns: A BGR565 encoded color.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.ToRgbFormat(System.Drawing.ColorOrder,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Gets a RGB space color conversion in any order with any byte per color.
member.param: The color order.
The number of bits for the R component.
The number of bits for the G component.
The number of bits for the B component.
member.returns: Thz space encoded color scheme with the requested number of bits per component.
member.exception: Not valid number of bits, it should be less or equal to 8.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.FromName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a known Color name into a Color.
member.param: The known color name.
member.returns: The color or null if not found.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.Color.ToString
member.summary: Gets the color in standard HEX format
member.returns: The standard HEX string.

member.summary: Gets the Y position for this point.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.

The Y position.

member.summary: The start point (X = 0, Y = 0).

member.summary: Checks if the specified points are equivalent based on their and values.
member.param: The first to to check.
The other to check.
member.returns: True if both instances are the same position.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.UI.Point.op_Inequality(nanoFramework.UI.Point,nanoFramework.UI.Point)
member.summary: Checks if the specified points are equivalent based on their and values.
member.param: The first to to check.
The other to check.
member.returns: True if one refers to a different position than the other.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.UI.Point.op_Addition(nanoFramework.UI.Point,nanoFramework.UI.Point)
member.summary: Sums the and values of the specified points.
member.param: The first point.
The other point.
member.returns: A new with the sum of and values of the specified points.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.UI.Point.op_Subtraction(nanoFramework.UI.Point,nanoFramework.UI.Point)
member.summary: Deducts the and values of the specified points.

The other point.
